price: Nagsabi sila: “Sumpa man kay Allāh, tunay ikaw ay talagang nasa kamalian mong matanda.”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
